phrases: Sometimes at night, when I happen to catch the scent of flowers,
I feel as though I am about to remember something I have forgotten.
But I can never seem to remember
that familiar, yet strangely terrifying, something.
Just a traveler seeking shelter from the rain.
Would it be possible for me to spend the night here?
So if you feel unwell at all or have noticed anything unusual,
I may be able to help.
Perhaps the only thing that ails us
is that, for all our toiling, life just never seems to get any easier.
You mentioned that you are a traveler...
Maybe you could tell us about other lands.
None of us have left this village in a very long time.
It was a pleasure listening to your strange tales.
We have had such average, unremarkable lives.
Those are the best kind, though.
Well, you have got a point there.
I wonder where the day went.
I would better head home soon, or she will start to worry.
I just cannot shake the feeling that I have forgotten something very important.
Has this cave always been here?
Or did someone dig it recently?
It is coming from inside of it.
That means it must have an exit, right?
Maybe I can get home faster if I go through it.
The scent is only getting stronger in here.
What is it that I have forgotten?
It was... something that happened a long time ago.
Our sake's reputation is getting worse by the year.
If you are going to demand better pay,
at least try making better sake first!
But with what you pay us now
Do not you dare talk back to me!
Come, that is nothing for you to worry about.
What, you do not know how to apologize?!
If you will not apologize, then get out!
Every last one of them has been drained?
Who would do such a thing?
Do not I know her from somewhere?
Let me carry that for you.
but I cannot quite put my finger on what it is.
There is something I cannot remember.
However, I am positive I have seen this cave before.
It is coming from inside of it.
That must mean it has an exit.
Otherwise, she will start to worry.
I am sure I was about to remember something just now.
And lately, everything feels really strange.
I know I have lived in this house my whole life...
but it feels like just a distant memory at times.
For some reason, I cannot shake the feeling that this has happened before.
I am certain this, too, has happened before...
No matter how much I try, I cannot remember.
Just a traveler seeking shelter from the rain.
Would it be possible for me to spend the night here?
So if you feel unwell at all or have noticed anything unusual,
I may be able to help.
Actually, something has been troubling me lately.
there have been times when I see or experience something for the first time
but feel like I have already seen it before...
or that it is happened to me already.
It is not just my imagination.
I have the same feeling right now.
I feel certain that I have let you stay at my home before, on a rainy night just like this one.
Well, this is my first time coming to these parts.
Well, it is not like it is anything serious.
It is just that I find it a bit disconcerting.
It makes me wonder if it is just me, or if it happens to others too.
Do you feel anxious when you smell flowers at night?
That is usually when I feel like I have forgotten something.
You may have become trapped by a Kairou, or Looping Tunnel mushi.
It is pitch-black and resembles a cavernous tube, and it lures in insects and beasts by exuding a flowery scent.
And more pertinently, rumor has it that it warps its prey's time into a loop.
If that is truly the case,
its prey may be forced to relive its life over and over.
No one can really confirm it for sure, but...
it is possible that you have lived through your life many times over.
Furthermore, it is also likely that you will meet the Kairou again at some point in the future.
But if you unknowingly enter it yet again,
and you will re-experience your entire life.
There are indeed cases of deja vu like yours,
but it is hardly possible to investigate them in full.
No one can know everything about someone else's whole life.
I have been living the same life over and over?
I really cannot say for sure.
Nevertheless, I would advise you to avoid any dark places that give off a flowery scent.
As far as I know, no one trapped by a Kairou has ever managed to change the past into one of his own choosing.
Besides, now that you are this aware of your feelings of deja vu,
you might not be able to return to the past again.
After going through the loop so many times, you might just end up becoming one with the Kairou.
Do not ever think of entering it again.
There is part of my past I would like to change...
but more than that, I would like to live out the rest of my life.
I would rather see my daughter grow up...
and have children of her own, too.
I would like to see the part of my life I have never seen before.
I am going to go gather some mountain vegetables.
I wonder where the day went.
I would better head home soon.
I have gone through this cave, time after time...
only to return to the past.
This is my first time seeing you like this.
I feel as though I have been in a blissful nightmare all this time.
every day will be a new day.
I will get you to a doctor right away!
I might not make it back in time!
Do not ever think of entering it again.
There is a flowery scent coming from inside of this cave.
Maybe we can get home faster if we go through it.
You are definitely going to make it.
you will live with me again.
Just now, it felt like I was just about to remember something.
Just a traveler seeking shelter from the rain.
Would it be possible for me to spend the night here?
